name: Life Force (itch)
description:
Life is a currency, thus you will need to spend your life to hire your troops and heal them in order to beat vicious enemies in a dark dungeon.

- Tip -
1. Don't click the text on the button / when hiring, don't press the heart. 
2. Upgrade no work. We will work on later.
3. left mouse click to move, right mouse click to heal your members.
4. You already have 4 members so you can good to go to make your own formation or hire more to prepare yourself!
